import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Checkout_progress from '../components/Checkout_progress' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import { API } from '../config' const ConfirmOrder = () => { const cart_items = useSelector(state => state.cart.cart_items) let order_items_number_arr = cart_items ? cart_items.map(items=>items.quantity): [] let order_items_number = order_items_number_arr.reduce((acc, cur)=>acc+cur) sessionStorage.setItem('order_items', order_items_number) let order_total_arr = cart_items ? cart_items.map(item=> item.quantity*item.price): [] let order_total = order_total_arr.reduce((acc,cur)=>acc+cur) sessionStorage.setItem('order_total', order_total) return (

Order Details

{ cart_items.length > 0 && { cart_items.map((item, i) => { return }) }
S.No. Product Image Product Name Product Price Quantity Total Price
{i + 1} {item.name} Rs.{item.price}
{item.quantity}
 Rs.{item.quantity*item.price}
}

Order Summary

Items: {order_items_number}

Order Total: Rs.{order_total}

Proceed to Shipping
) } export default ConfirmOrder
